item.title: 8/16: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Trump sides with Putin, saying a peace deal instead of a ceasefire will end the war; Exploring the meteorite that landed in a Georgia house up close

item.title: How an undercover sting at a Phoenix Chili's led to the capture of the canal killer
item.description: Evidence from dinner reveals the Zombie Hunter as a killer.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Unmasking the "Zombie Hunter"
item.description: How police connected the murders of two young women to a man known as a zombie-fighting comic book hero. "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant repor...

item.title: 8/16: Saturday Morning
item.description: Trump, Putin meeting in Alaska ends without a ceasefire deal; Meet chef Ana Sortun.
